archimate:Requirement.name: TS.1.2.2b: b) ways in which malware can install itself on endpoint devices (e.g. opening infected attachments sent via email, collaboration platforms and voice communication services; clicking on malicious links on suspicious websites; and installing software from unknown origin or unauthorised removable media)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
